name: big block's office
description:
I don't know if the built in game works but try this! https://goodboycookie.github.io/office-game/

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Come take a seat in front of your new screen at *big block's office* where you'll work hard for fair pay, and sort small blocks every day! Feel free to meet some fellow sorters, but don't get caught up chopping it up, or you'll be next on the chopping block! Find the game at a link here somewhere on the page.
